body: # wls 1.0 # Web Directory Listing ![wls](https://raw.github.com/prashanta/wls/master/test/screen-1.png) ### About --------- __wls__ is a minimalistic approach to directory listing. It has six fundamental features: 1. Multiple sort table 2. Breadcrumb navigation 3. Folder title via .comment file 4. File comments via .comment file 5. Summary of contents in a directory 6. Filter list by file type ### Installation ---------------- Copy the contents of wls to the director that you want to have it managed. All the consequent sub folders will be managed. Yup, thats it. ### Which files are ignored? ---------------------------- - index.php - Any file/folder that begins with "." ### 3rd Party: ---------------------------- - jQuery: http://jquery.com/ - Tablesorter: http://tablesorter.com/ Demo: http://prashanta.me/wls
